original_text: Then Jehu got into his chariot and he rode to Jezreel, because King Joram was resting there. Ahaziah, the king of Judah, had also gone to Jezreel to visit King Joram.
korean_text: 예후가 병거를 타고 이스르엘로 가니 요람 왕이 거기에 누워 있었음이라 유다의 왕 아하시야는 요람을 보러 내려왔더라

sentences.original_text: Then Jehu got into his chariot
because King Joram was resting there
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 요람 왕이 그곳에서 쉬고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Ahaziah, the king of Judah, had also gone to Jezreel
